text: Hello Dom ! I'm interested in this opportunity. Can I sent you a DM ?

elements.text: Hello Dom ! I'm interested in this opportunity. Can I sent you a DM ?

text:
Hi folks! I'm working on a blog post called 'Why & How to Repurpose Your Facebook Ads for Native,' where 'native' campaigns are those being launched on Taboola, Outbrain, or any other native ad platform and served on news websites and online magazines. The post will be published on the <https://joinative.com/blog/|Joinative blog>. If you'd like to share your thoughts (2-5 sentences) on any of these questions, please DM me:

1. What's one main advantage of native over FB advertising?
2. What's your opinion on the trend of shifting advertising budgets from FB and turning to other channels, native included? Will it last long?
3. What are your tips on repurposing FB ads for native? What major adjustments do you need to make?

attachments.title: Native Advertising best practices & insights
attachments.text: See the latest trends in Native Advertising and get access to best practices, detailed guides and inspiration, with news on the biggest advertising platforms.
attachments.fallback: Joinative: Native Advertising best practices & insights
